outputs.output_descr: Works with the Ministry of Security in Puntland, helping develop systems and capacities to perform their role of support and supervision of the local authorities sector.
UNDP component of Joint Programme on Local Gevernance and Decentralized Delivery management project.
Works with Ministry of Interior in Somaliland, helping develop systems and capacities to perform its role of support and supervision of the local authorities sector.
Works with Ministry of Interior in South Central Somalia, helping develop systems and capacities to perform their role of support and supervision of the local authorities sector.

project_descr: Supports peace and state building in Somalia by strengthening local governance and improving the ability of district-level local authorities to reach out to their communities and deliver local development.
